title: Blueprint For Star Players To Get Traded, Updates From Camp
description:
Brian Windhorst, Nick Friedell and Ohm Youngmisuk talk NBA teams training in San Diego, Kyrie’s vaccination status, the blueprint for players like Ben Simmons to get a trade and what to expect as the season starts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Updates On Vaccination Status Around The NBA, Unique Training Camp Setups
